example.text: The groomsmen were all in kilts because the groom thought " they were cool " ,

roleset.name: temperature between luke warm and very cold

example.name: arg1
example.text: The water was cool but the kids went swimming...even Mya.

roleset.name: unfriendly, aloof

example.name: both args
example.text: She was cool toward him and seemed to resent his presence.
